info.title: Real-Time Collaborative TODO API
info.description: A scalable real-time collaborative TODO list application supporting 100M+ daily active users

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: ConfirmPasswordResetRequest contains new password for reset.

post.summary: Refresh access token using refresh token.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: RefreshTokenRequest contains refresh token for obtaining new access token.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: RequestPasswordResetRequest contains email for password reset.

get.summary: List media with filtering and pagination.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: UploadMediaRequest for uploading media files. (streaming inputs)

post.summary: Generate pre-signed URL for direct client upload.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: GenerateUploadURLRequest for generating pre-signed upload URLs.

post.summary: Send heartbeat to indicate user is active.

get.summary: Get online users for a TODO list or team.

delete.summary: Unshare a TODO list from a team.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: ClearOldLogsRequest for cleaning up old logs.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: CreateTeamRequest contains data for creating a new team.

post.summary: Add a user to a team.

delete.summary: Remove a user from a team.

post.summary: Share a TODO list with a team.

get.summary: List TODO items with filtering, sorting, and pagination.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: CreateTODORequest contains data for creating a new TODO.

post.summary: Update status of multiple TODO items.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: BulkUpdateStatusRequest for updating status of multiple TODOs.

get.summary: Get a TODO item by ID.

delete.summary: Delete a TODO item by ID.

post.summary: Move TODO item to new position or parent.

TODOServiceMoveTODOBody.description: MoveTODORequest for changing TODO position or parent.

tags.title: Note: Cannot use optional with repeated

mediaAttachments.title: Note: Cannot use optional with repeated

TODOServiceUpdateTODOBody.description: UpdateTODORequest contains data for updating an existing TODO.

TeamServiceAddTeamMemberBody.description: AddTeamMemberRequest for adding a user to a team.

TeamServiceShareListBody.description: ShareListRequest for sharing a TODO list with a team.

TeamServiceUpdateSharedListBody.description: UpdateSharedListRequest for updating shared list permissions.

TeamServiceUpdateTeamBody.description: UpdateTeamRequest contains data for updating a team.

TeamServiceUpdateTeamMemberBody.description: UpdateTeamMemberRequest for updating team member permissions.

commonv1Status.description: Status represents the state of a TODO item.

v1Activity.description: Activity represents a user activity in the system.

v1BulkUpdateStatusRequest.description: BulkUpdateStatusRequest for updating status of multiple TODOs.

v1ClearOldLogsRequest.description: ClearOldLogsRequest for cleaning up old logs.

v1ConfirmPasswordResetRequest.description: ConfirmPasswordResetRequest contains new password for reset.

v1CreateTODORequest.description: CreateTODORequest contains data for creating a new TODO.

v1CreateTeamRequest.description: CreateTeamRequest contains data for creating a new team.

v1DateRange.description: DateRange defines a range of dates.

v1EventType.description: EventType defines types of real-time events.

v1GenerateUploadURLRequest.description: GenerateUploadURLRequest for generating pre-signed upload URLs.

v1ListActivitiesResponse.description: ListActivitiesResponse with activities and pagination info.

v1ListLogsResponse.description: ListLogsResponse with logs and pagination info.

v1ListMediaResponse.description: ListMediaResponse with media list and pagination info.

v1ListSharedListsResponse.description: ListSharedListsResponse with shared lists and pagination info.

v1ListTODOsResponse.description: ListTODOsResponse contains TODO list and pagination info.

v1ListTeamMembersResponse.description: ListTeamMembersResponse with members and pagination info.

v1ListTeamsResponse.description: ListTeamsResponse with teams and pagination info.

v1LogEntry.description: LogEntry represents a system log entry.

v1LoginResponse.description: LoginResponse contains authentication tokens and user info.

v1MediaAttachment.description: MediaAttachment represents media content attached to a TODO.

v1MediaType.description: MediaType specifies the type of media content attached to a TODO.

v1OnlineUser.description: OnlineUser represents a currently online user.

v1PaginationRequest.description: PaginationRequest defines parameters for paginated requests.

v1Permission.description: Permission defines the access level for shared TODO lists.

v1Priority.description: Priority defines the priority level of a TODO item.

v1RealtimeEvent.description: RealtimeEvent represents a real-time collaboration event.

v1RefreshTokenRequest.description: RefreshTokenRequest contains refresh token for obtaining new access token.

v1RegisterResponse.description: RegisterResponse contains the registered user information.

v1RequestPasswordResetRequest.description: RequestPasswordResetRequest contains email for password reset.

v1Role.description: Role defines user roles within a team.

v1ServiceStatus.description: ServiceStatus contains status of a specific service.

v1ServingStatus.description: ServingStatus defines the serving status of a service.

sharedBy.title: User ID who shared the list

v1SharedList.description: SharedList represents a TODO list shared with a team.

v1TODO.description: TODO represents a single TODO item.

v1Team.description: Team represents a group of users collaborating on TODO lists.

v1TeamMember.description: TeamMember represents a user's membership in a team.

v1UpdateSharedListResponse.description: UpdateSharedListResponse contains updated shared list information.

v1UpdateTeamMemberResponse.description: UpdateTeamMemberResponse contains updated team member information.

v1User.description: User represents a user in the system.
